programme.title: Assir Al Madfoun
programme.desc: A murder case that remained unsolved for 10 years is reopened when the victim's friend reappears and his father points an accusing finger at the long-absent friend.

programme.title: Life Song
programme.desc: Beyram returns to his native Istanbul to reconcile with his close friend, and they agree to marry their children Kerim and Melek when they grow up. Kerim grew up in Germany; but his father forces him to return and marry Melek, but Hulya, Melek's younger sister, wants to marry him.

programme.title: My Home My Destiny
programme.desc: Zeynep is a young law student who finds herself torn between her two mothers. She has been trying for years to equalize the two parties and is appreciative of her mother's genuine sacrifices, but she also works hard to fulfill her mother's other ambitions.

programme.desc: The events revolve around the bitter reality of young Algerians, who resort to fleeing and traveling illegally in search of a better future, which reveals many tragic stories.

programme.title: Ghostbusters
programme.desc: Paranormal enthusiast Abby Yates and physicist Erin Gilbert form an unlikely paranormal investigating team with engineer Jillian Holtzmann and subway worker Patty Tolan. As ghouls descend on Times Square, the four women uncover a plot to cause an apocalypse by summoning ghosts to New York City.

programme.title: Escape from Pretoria
programme.desc: The true story of a group of prisoners who come up with a plan to escape from Pretoria Central Prison during the apartheid period in South Africa.

programme.title: I Will Find You a Better Home
programme.desc: A real estate company's core talent, Miss Fang, gets moved by the boss to a Shanghai shop, where she shares management duties with Mr. Xu. Meanwhile, the shop employees must carefully get along with the two managers because of their completely different management philosophies.

programme.title: An Imperfect Murder
programme.desc: A famous actress named Vera Lockman has a horrible dream in which she kills her drug-dealing ex-boyfriend Sal. When she wakes up, she finds that her living room is where his body was found and that the murder had actually happened the day before.

programme.title: No Sudden Move
programme.desc: When a group of small-time criminals are given a simple job to do, things take an unexpected turn as their plan goes south, so they set out to uncover what went wrong.

programme.desc: Peter Parker is bitten by a genetically modified spider that gives him superhuman abilities, while he secretly loves Mary. programme.title: Kontak
programme.desc: Current social and political issues based on true events are presented in a comedy setting in this series.

programme.title: Thuluj alsayf
programme.desc: Among people’s every day stories, Ahmed and Nabila share love but their careers matter a lot in supporting their families. In Laila’s story, she is an undergraduate whose family depends on her father’s small income, and she seldom sees her married siblings. A third story is about Bothayna and Salah who are happily married with a son, but are parted when Salah gets shot while chasing smugglers.

programme.title: Harem Al-Shawish
programme.desc: The series revolves around the love of money and power and how the simple and complicated social issues are resolved. It also discusses the things that disturb the lives of people who bring out evil and good in other people's lives.

programme.title: Baad Edet Sanawat
programme.desc: It discusses the change between the past and the present, as the events are set between the 1980s and the year 2014 through Abu Nawras, who lives in a working-class neighborhood and has many children.

programme.title: Forsa Akhera
programme.desc: The story of a woman whose husband has died. She and her son move to live with his family. Afterwards, her relationship with another man causes many conflicts in the family.

programme.title: Golden Boy S2
programme.desc: In the second season, Ferit is urgently brought to Istanbul after he was shot, and Seyran remains by his side, as the surgery he will undergo is fraught with risks. Hatice meets with Saffet Aga and Halis Aga to prevent further chaos and the closure of Saffet Aga's case.

programme.title: Dirty Laundry
programme.desc: The lives of the wealthiest and most influential families in Istanbul, and their maids frequently become a part of their stories after being exposed to the mysteries, secrets, and murders kept behind closed doors.

programme.title: Al Thaman
programme.desc: The widow Sarah resorts to her only remaining option to cover the costs of her son Ibrahim's cancer treatment, so she agrees to spend one night with the manager of the company, Zain, in return for an amount of money.

programme.title: Prisoner
programme.desc: Firat is an accomplished federal prosecutor. As he loses his memory and ends up imprisoned after he gets charged with killing his wife and daughter, he must break out of prison in order to find out the truth.

programme.title: Prova
programme.desc: Majid is a young headmaster in a private school, seeking to make some changes at his school, and his life as well; he has no idea that his wish will come true when he bumps into Layal, who works as a dog trainer and a musician in a restaurant.

programme.desc: People, Drama 2020 A woman suffers from a lot of problems when she converts to Judaism in a society overwhelmed with racism. Hayat Al Fahed , Mohamed Gaber, Ahmed Al Jasmy , Abdel Mohsen Al Nemr, Soaad Ali, Faghriya Khamis, Fouad Ali, Mohamed Jamal Al Adl, Muhammad Shams

programme.title: Del Ragel
programme.desc: When his daughter Shahd is injured in a violent accident, the life of Galal turns upside down. Dr. Malak sympathizes with his crisis, as she tries to help him seek the justice that his daughter is due and to get out of his ordeal.

programme.title: She Looks Great (Ep23)
programme.desc: Drama, Romance, Bollywood 2021 Priya lives in her family home with her mother and sisters. She suffers in her life and believes that there is no place for love in her, after her lover left her to marry her sister. Nakuul Mehta, Disha Parmar, Amit Singh Thakur, Rohan Kapoor, Alefia Kapadia, Jyoti Tiwari, Ekta Kapoor, Sahir Raza

programme.title: Arbeeny Fy el Eshreen
programme.desc: Fahd wakes up after a coma that lasted nearly twenty years and finds himself at the age of forty. He tries to remember and learn everything he has missed. He is surprised by his wife's (Ahd) divorce from him, and her closeness to his cousin Saleh. He finds himself at a crossroads, either to continue alone or to defend his previous life and recover it, whatever the consequences are.

programme.title: Ghamam's Island (Ep13)
programme.desc: Romance, Thriller, History, Drama, Fantasy 2022 Everything turns upside down on Ghamam Island when Shiekh Madien gives the sins note to his follower before his death, a drowned body by coincidence is discovered, and a gypsy shows up in the village. Tareq Lotfy, Fathy Abd Alwahab, Mai Ezz Al Din, Ahmed Amin, Wafaa Amer, Mohamed Gom`aa, Riyad Al Khouly, Hussein El Menbawy, Abdel Rahim Kamal

programme.title: Bab Al Harah (Ep3)
programme.desc: Thriller, Drama 2009 Grief controls the people living in the district. As a lot of young people where killed in the last battle. programme.title: Bade Achhe Lagte Hain 2
programme.desc: Priya and Ram are two people from different worlds. As circumstances bring them together, they get married, and over time, their bond gets stronger as they fall in love.

programme.title: Be My Sunshine (Ep69)
programme.desc: Comedy, Romance 2021 Hazira travels to a remote island to explore a land her bosses want to take to establish a resort. She meets Poyraz, a young man who owns a small olive factory. programme.title: Jazeerat Ghamam

programme.title: Bab Al-Hara 3

programme.desc: When Jabal's father is murdered, the blood feud sends his family and the Al-Sa'eid family into a cycle of violence and tribal conflicts, as those who have unfinished business with Jabal's father appear to complicate things for Jabal.

programme.title: The Best 1973 Party...Ever!

programme.title: The 1973 POWER Hour with Bam!
programme.desc: Seventies music power to play loud! Work out your speakers with some pure power pop and rock including Pink Floyd, T.Rex, and Led Zep!

programme.title: The NOW Yearbook 1973

programme.title: 70s Glam Slam!
programme.desc: Rewind to a time of big hair, outrageous makeup and platform shoes. The greatest gems of glam pop and rock, including Queen, ABBA and Wizzard.

programme.title: Funky & Soulful! 45 x 45s!
programme.desc: 45 soulful tunes from the 70s - with laid-back ballads, funky pop and devastating disco. This is the decade in 4 hours!

programme.desc: Feelgood hits from just one decade - the 1970s! Platform boots and flares at the ready?

programme.title: Don't Stop! 30 Feelgood Rock Hits
